channel.title: How do I make myself owner on 667/711?
channel.description:
hey guys, i'm just wondering how to make myself an owner on my 667/711 rsps, i can play it and stuff but idk how to make myself and owner. I have teamviewer if anyone would like to help via teamviewer.
Appreciate the help guys! :)

item.title: How do I make myself owner on 667/711?
item.dc:creator: @tabble tabble
item.description:
@tabble wrote:

right now im admin on my server, but i want to give myself a title and it says i need to be a donator to do so…

how do i make myself donator? please do help.

thanks :[)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make myself owner on 667/711?

item.title: How do I make myself owner on 667/711?
item.dc:creator: @dragnnight0 dragnnight0
item.description:
@dragnnight0 wrote:

First let me tell you i"m assuming you just came from like 317’s Because in 508+ you don’t have owner just admin

second you could try this go to in your source folder data/characters or data/saved games

and see if you can edit your character file if you can open it with word pad or note pad and do ctrl f and search for player rights or just rights and change it from 0 to 2 that’s admin

0= player
1= Mod
2=Admin

or if you cant open the character file go into your source files go to src and find a file called actionsender.java and look for a code something like this

public static void loginResponse(Player player) { player.getAppearance().resetAppearence(); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("dragnnight")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("zbucu")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("andrew")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(1); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(1);

and that is how you make your self admin if you need any more help i will try and help you

Read full topic
